name: Santy is Home
description:
[!] Web build takes some time to load for the first time. Downloads are recommended

It's Christmas day! Your daughter is knocking on your door early in the morning, better go check it out! Wait, what's this note? Where's your daughter? Who's Santy and why do we need to prepare a present for him to get our daughter back? Well, just do what the note says, what could possibly go wrong?

===============================================================
dev note: merry christmas everyone :D a short project that I managed to complete after a while, clutched the christmas date too, phew. 
let me know any bugs you encounter in the comments,  happy holidays and stay safe!
